description: Celtic goalkeepers in the headlines as Barry Ferguson is backed for longer stint in the Rangers dugout.
title: Kasper Schmeichel caught up in row as Viljami Sinisalo gets set for Celtic league debut
title_page: Kasper Schmeichel caught up in row as Viljami Sinisalo gets set for Celtic league debut - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Denmark's players union is demanding an apology from a journalist following criticism of Celtic goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel while the 38-year-old has been on international duty. (Sun), external
Comments about Schmeichel's weight are "way over the line", says union rep Michael Sahl Hansen. (Record), external
Viljami Sinisalo, 23, is expected to make his Celtic league debut on Saturday against Hearts, with Schmeichel set to miss out injured. (Sun), external
Australia midfielder Cammy Devlin, 26, is in line to return for Hearts at Celtic Park. (Edinburgh Evening News - subscription required), external
Hibernian duo Martin Boyle and Lewis Miller helped Australia defeat hosts China 2-0. (Scotsman - subscription required), external
